lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador's Tour de France chances took another knock on Sunday as the Spaniard lost time to the big favorites, crashing for the second time in as many days during the second stage won by his team mate and world champion Peter Sagan.

headline.print_headline: Contador's Hopes Dented, Sagan Takes Lead With Stage Win
headline.main: Contador's Hopes Dented, Sagan Takes Lead With Stage Win
